member.name: T:Terrasoft.Core.ConfigurationBuild.IAppConfigurationBuilder
member.summary: Provides methods to build configuration client content to application defined output directory.

member.name: M:Terrasoft.Core.ConfigurationBuild.IAppConfigurationBuilder.BuildAll
member.summary: Builds configuration client content for all schemas.

member.name: M:Terrasoft.Core.ConfigurationBuild.IAppConfigurationBuilder.BuildChanged
member.summary: Builds configuration client content for changed schemas.

member.name: T:Terrasoft.Core.ConfigurationBuild.IConfigurationBuilder
member.summary: Provides methods to build configuration client content.

member.name: M:Terrasoft.Core.ConfigurationBuild.IConfigurationBuilder.BuildAllAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Builds configuration client content for all schemas asynchronously.
member.param: Directory to write configuration client content to.
member.returns: Task that represents asynchronous build operation.

member.name: M:Terrasoft.Core.ConfigurationBuild.IConfigurationBuilder.BuildChangedAsync(System.String)

member.returns: Task that represents asynchronous build operation.
